More examplesFewer examplesa circumnavigation of the globe from west to eastThe TV series continues its haphazard meander around the globe - this week it will be in Portugal.The surge in US share prices reverberated across the globe.Although she retired from politics five years ago, she still trots around the globe, giving speeches and meeting world leaders.This event will be watched by an estimated 20 million people around the globe.
[ C ] a map of the world made in the shape of a ball and attached to a support, that can be turned around at the same angle as the earth turns in space: spin a globe She spun the globe, and pointed to the Solomon Islands.
